text: The 2. Rugby Bundesliga is the second level of domestic club rugby union competition in Austria. Wombats RC of Wiener Neustadt is the only separate club in the league, the rest of the teams being the second teams of the 1. Rugby Bundesliga clubs. ==History== The 2. Rugby Bundesliga was first played in the 1995/1996 season. ==Current teams== 2010-11 season {|class="wikitable" width="100%" |- !width="20%"|Club!!width="37%"|Full name!!width="22%"|City!!width="21%"|Stadium |- |Celtic Wanderers |Vienna Celtic Rugby Football Club |Vienna |Sportareal Dirnelwiese |- |Donau Korsaren |Rugby Club Donau |Vienna |Sportareal Dirnelwiese |- |Stade Viennois II |Rugby Club Stade Viennois |Vienna |Sportareal Dirnelwiese |- |Tiroler Böck |Rugby Club Innsbruck |Innsbruck |Fenner Stadion |- |Wombats |Wombats Rugby Club |Wiener Neustadt |Neuklosterwiese |- |} ==Results== The scores in blue are links to accounts of finals on the site of the Austrian Rugby Federation (ÖRV) - in German {|border="0" width="100%" align="center" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="3" style="border:1px solid #CCCCCC" |-bgcolor="#E4E4E4" | style="background:#CCCCCC;color:#000000" width="110" |Year | style="background:#CCCCCC;color:#000000" |Champion | style="background:#CCCCCC;color:#000000" width="70" align="center" |Score | style="background:#CCCCCC;color:#000000"|Runner-up | style="background:#CCCCCC;color:#000000"|Place |- |align=left|1993 | | | | |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|1994 | | | | |- |align=left|1995 | | | | |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|1996 | | | | |- |align=left|1997 | | | | |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|1998 | | | | |- |align=left|1999 | | | | |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|2000 | | | | |- |align=left|2001 | |align=center| | |align=left| |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|2002 | |align=center| | |align=left| |- |align=left|2003 | |align=center| | |align=left| |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|2004 | |align=center| | |align=left| |- |align=left|2005 | |align=center| | |align=left| |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|2006 | | |align=center| | |- |align=left|2007 | | | |align=left| |- bgcolor="#efefef" |align=left|2008 |1.
